The Dirty Dozen list is the EWG published list of the 12 vegetables and fruits with the most pesticide residue. When it comes to foods on this list, it may be preferable to choose organic.

The Clean Fifteen is their published list of the 15 vegetables and fruits with the least of amount of pesticides. You may be safe purchasing these foods with less concern of whether or not they are grown organically.
